name: interrelated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected in such a way that each thing has an effect on or depends on the other: interrelated problems/issues/activities Anxiety and depression are often interrelated. See
interrelate
More examplesFewer examplesEverything is interrelated, and a clean environment means clean, healthy communities.The book is a collection of interrelated pieces on modern travel.All of these problems are interrelated.
